name: ksamati-app
description: Aplicación KSAMATI - Sistema de gestión multiplataforma

scripts.build: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install
scripts.setup-db-complete: node -e "const mysql=require('mysql2/promise'),fs=require('fs'),path=require('path'); (async()=>{try{const c=await mysql.createConnection({host:process.env.DB_HOST||'localhost',user:process.env.DB_USER||'root',password:process.env.DB_PASSWORD||'',multipleStatements:true}); const sql=fs.readFileSync(path.join(__dirname,'server/database/ksamati_complete_schema.sql'),'utf8'); await c.execute(sql); console.log('✅ BD completa instalada'); await c.end();}catch(e){console.log('❌ Error:', e.message);}})();"
scripts.setup-db-production: node -e "const mysql=require('mysql2/promise'),fs=require('fs'),path=require('path'); (async()=>{try{const c=await mysql.createConnection({host:process.env.DB_HOST||'localhost',user:process.env.DB_USER||'root',password:process.env.DB_PASSWORD||'',multipleStatements:true}); const sql=fs.readFileSync(path.join(__dirname,'server/database/setup-production.sql'),'utf8'); await c.execute(sql); console.log('✅ BD de producción instalada'); await c.end();}catch(e){console.log('❌ Error:', e.message);}})();"
scripts.check-db: node -e "const mysql=require('mysql2/promise'); (async()=>{try{const c=await mysql.createConnection({host:process.env.DB_HOST||'localhost',user:process.env.DB_USER||'root',password:process.env.DB_PASSWORD||'',database:process.env.DB_NAME||'ksamti_proyectos'}); await c.execute('SELECT COUNT(*) FROM proyectos'); console.log('✅ Base de datos OK'); await c.end();}catch(e){console.log('❌ BD no configurada:', e.message);}})();"
